channel.title: Need help. Cant get people joining :S!
channel.description:
Hi there, as i really want this private server to work for me, im going to get thru detailed what i have done and maybe you could see what the problem is.
First of, ive downloaded Java 6 update 16, i made path's and classpath's. [URL=http://img62.imageshack.us/i/systemclass.png/][IMG]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/2540/systemclass.th.png[/img][/URL] Then i went to www.no-ip.com and made my account, i added a ip i wanted and downloaded the DUC [URL=http://img255.imageshack.us/i/noip.png/][IMG]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/6271/noip.th.png[/img][/URL] I downloaded an BASE (Source) named ''BlankScape'' from this forum (It sounds easy so i took that one)
i extracted it and then took up the source file, i edited the compiler til' jdk16 and it worked fine.
i pressed on the run.bat and it said the server is online.
Then i went to the client folder and typed in gui.java and edited the ip to exiledscape.no-ip.biz and ran it. [URL=http://img264.imageshack.us/i/guie.png/][IMG]http://img264.imageshack.us/img264/1606/guie.th.png[/img][/URL]
I made coming into the server but when my friends are trying they cant come in. I dont know what the problem is.
oh and by the way. i've already opened my ports in portforwarding so that shouldnt be a problem.
Please tell me if im missing something, like changing the ip in the folders and so on. i really want to do this:) tyvm!<3

item.title: Need help. Cant get people joining :S!
item.dc:creator: @nimoo nimoo
item.description:
@nimoo wrote:

Well i didnt find the thing shamu said, but i tried to search for 127.0.0.1 in the client.java folder and i found it, i replaced it with my ip (exiledscape.no-ip.biz) and he tried 2 join… still didnt work
could it be because of the source?
Heres a pic of the server ip i changed:

Read full topic

@suikodenscape wrote:

yeah that or, the ip is set as 127.0.0.1
So try to search that in your Z-file searcher if you have one. if not look in client.java or Gui again

@shamu308 wrote:

System.out.println(“Loading client…”);
Serverip = “Put ur server ip here”;
sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(Serverip));
initUI();
for now it should be like this

item.title: Need help. Cant get people joining :S!
item.dc:creator: @nimoo nimoo
item.description:
@nimoo wrote:

Hi there, as i really want this private server to work for me, im going to get thru detailed what i have done and maybe you could see what the problem is.

First of, ive downloaded Java 6 update 16, i made path’s and classpath’s.

Then i went to www.no-ip.com and made my account, i added a ip i wanted and downloaded the DUC

I downloaded an BASE (Source) named ‘‘BlankScape’’ from this forum (It sounds easy so i took that one)

i extracted it and then took up the source file, i edited the compiler til’ jdk16 and it worked fine.

i pressed on the run.bat and it said the server is online.

Then i went to the client folder and typed in gui.java and edited the ip to exiledscape.no-ip.biz and ran it.

I made coming into the server but when my friends are trying they cant come in. I dont know what the problem is.

oh and by the way. i’ve already opened my ports in portforwarding so that shouldnt be a problem.

Please tell me if im missing something, like changing the ip in the folders and so on. i really want to do this:) tyvm!<3

Read full topic
